summary.name: summary
summary.value: Class \Zend\Reflection\ReflectionMethod not found while using zf.bat

description.name: description
description.value:
Another missing (invalid) class while using zf.bat.

I'm using zendframework-zf2-release-2.0.0dev2-3-ge7afb6d


C:\Users\me\workspace>zf create project zf2
